ourRoute.FirstPageRoute: Smotrova - Source - Dzhigit Stone - Aderbiivka - Mount Nexis - -Stormy Gate - Kebabs - Tsigelsky Waterfall (bowl of love) - Fast and Furious

test.ChangeRoute: Is it difficult to choose a route?

service.FirstText: When renting or renting strictly follow the safety rules and all the instructor's requirements!
service.SecendText: Manage to the best of your ability and opportunities. Do not overestimate yourself! It is dangerous!
service.ThirdText: Before each ride, an experienced instructor will teach You will be guided by the basics of management and will accompany you throughout the entire route.
service.FourthText: When renting or renting, strictly follow safety rules and all the requirements of the instructor!
service.FirstTextBefore: persons younger than 16 years and persons under the influence of alcohol!

gift.OriginalGift: Do you want to make an original gift?
gift.TextEmotion: Give unforgettable emotions - the best gift!
gift.GiftText: Do you want to surprise your loved ones with an original gift Gift certificate for an excursion on quad bikes will be not just an interesting gift, and a real opportunity to bring your friends and loved ones closer to a new hobby.
gift.GiftDiscount: Hurry up to pick up the promotion!
gift.ButtonGift: We will select a certificate for you
